thread.title: Well Win 2016 Without You, Otiko Tells Nyaho
thread.title_full: Well Win 2016 Without You, Otiko Tells Nyaho

title: Well Win 2016 Without You, Otiko Tells Nyaho
text:
Politics | 9 October 2015 21:26 CET We’ll Win 2016 Without You, Otiko Tells Nyaho Source: Peacefmonline.com 
Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo and the main opposition New Patriotic Party (NPP) will win the 2016 general elections without any help from founder-member Dr Nyaho Nyaho-Tamakloe, Women’s Organiser Otiko Afisa Djaba has said. 
That is her response to Dr Nyaho-Tamakloe’s criticism of the flagbearers month-long ‘Rise and Build’ tour, which has taken Mr Akufo-Addo through nine Regions so far. 
The tour, which will end in the national capital, Accra, on October 12, 2015, aims to gather momentum for the flagbearer ahead of the December 2016 elections. 
Dr Nyaho-Tamakloe has, however, said such a tour was needless. He told Neat FM's morning show 'GhanaMonTie' Wednesday that: “Rise and build tour is not what will get the party united.” 
“If you start such a tour without principal players in the NPP then where are you heading towards?” he asked. 
“What my party needs at the moment is a very strong, united front and not Rise and Build whatever tour! A united front is key to success! If we're not united, we should forget 2016, and truly, we're not united! Anyone who will tell you the party is united is not telling you the truth,” Dr Nyaho-Tamakloe said. 
But addressing supporters in the Ashanti Region, where Mr Akufo-Addo is currently touring, Otiko Djaba said though Dr Nyaho-Tamakloe enjoys being called a senior party member, he is doing little to help the efforts of the team in winning power in 2016. 
She has asked supporters of the NPP to ignore Dr Nyaho-Tamakloe’s criticism and rather focus on rallying efforts towards victory.
